inclusion.criterion: Bladder Dysfunction (Diagnosis of NLUTD or DES)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Other diagnoses which affect bladder bowel function (i.e. Spina Bifida)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Diagnosed learning disability (i.e. ADD or ADHD)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Mental health condition (i.e. anxiety or depression)
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Received intensive urotherapy and biofeedback in past 12 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Child is diagnosed with primary nocturnal enuresis
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has neurogenic bladder, recurrent UTIs, and multiple prior admissions for urosepsis. Urologist not concerned with leaking around suprapubic cath site.
